tags.name: Data Fetching Service
tags.description: INTERNAL API - for fetching and storing parliamentary data from the Bundestag API

get.description: Returns the health status of the data fetching service

200.description: Service is healthy and ready to fetch data

get.summary: Fetch parliamentary data from Bundestag API
get.description: Fetches parliamentary protocol data from the official Bundestag API with extensive filtering options. Supports date ranges, document types, election periods, and more. Optionally notifies subscribers of new data.

parameters.name: notify
parameters.description: Whether to notify subscribers about newly fetched data

parameters.name: f.aktualisiert.start
parameters.description: Filter by update start date (ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS)

parameters.name: f.aktualisiert.end
parameters.description: Filter by update end date (ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS)

parameters.name: f.datum.start
parameters.description: Filter by document start date (ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: f.datum.end
parameters.description: Filter by document end date (ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for fetching next set of results

500.description: Error occurred while fetching or storing data

200.description: Data fetching completed successfully. Returns list of successfully processed plenary protocol IDs.

400.description: Invalid request parameters or date format
